page.title: 02Morriston Carnival
page.content: A{Morriston Custom} In 1947 the first{Morriston} {Carnival}was organised.This has been an annual event until this year-1985. Everyone missed seeing the colourful floats and the{fairground}rides. The children in our school usually enjoy the dressing-up part of the Carnival.They hope to see it again next year. At first the money was used to buy things like pianos- but later on special medical equipment was bought. Many Morriston people are involved in the event -they form "The Morriston Hospital League of Friends". We in the Morriston area will be pleased when casualty facilities are once again available at our{hospital.} It is developing rapidly and has a great future which we proudly anticipate.{
